title: Christmas Wish #10: The Murray Family
description: Kris nominated her friend Kari who was diagnosed with non-alcoholic cirrhosis of the liver and has been in and out of the hospital now for the past couple years.  She's on a transplant list but she's very low on it.
itunes:summary: Kris nominated her friend Kari who was diagnosed with non-alcoholic cirrhosis of the liver and has been in and out of the hospital now for the past couple years.  She's on a transplant list but she's very low on it.
